modelIdentification.name: NATO Education and Training Network (NETN) Multi-Resolution Modelling (MRM) Module
modelIdentification.purpose:
The purpose of NETN-MRM is to support federations where models are represented at multiple levels of resolution and where the level of resolution can change dynamically during simulation.
The NETN-MRM FOM module provides a standard interface and protocol for conducting negotiated and coordinated aggregation and disaggregation of simulated units and entities.
modelIdentification.description: The MRM FOM module specifies classes necessary to enable federation multi-resolution modeling.
modelIdentification.useLimitation:
NETN-MRM covers the following cases:
* Disaggregation of AggregateEntity into lower level AggregateEntities * Disaggregation of AggregateEntity into Platforms * Aggregation of AggregateEntities into higher level AggregateEntity * Aggregation of Platforms into AggregateEntity * Triggering of Disaggregation * Triggering of Aggregation
modelIdentification.useHistory: v1.1.1 - Initial version of NETN-MRM FOM Module released as part of NETN-FOM v2.0 in AMSP-04 Ed A.

interactionClass.name: MRM_Object
interactionClass.semantics: Base class for Multi-Resolution Modelling (MRM) interactions.

parameter.name: AggregateFederate
parameter.semantics: Federate name; Required in MRM_DisaggregationRequest or MRM_AggregationRequest from MRM SP, and in MRM_DisaggregationResponse or MRM_AggregationResponse from AggregateFederate, else Optional.

parameter.name: HigherResolutionFederate
parameter.semantics: Federate name; Required in MRM_DisaggregationRequest or MRM_AggregationRequest from MRM SP, and in MRM_DisaggregationResponse or MRM_AggregationResponse from HigherResolutionFederate, else Optional.

interactionClass.name: MRM_DisaggregationRequest
interactionClass.semantics: A request to disaggregate an object instance specified by a UUID.

parameter.name: AggregateUuid
parameter.semantics: The UUID of the object instance intended for disaggregation.

parameter.name: AggregationState
parameter.semantics: Informs Aggregate Federate of intended Aggregation State: If Fully Disaggregate, the aggregate unit does not send updates and all Entities and/or (sub)units of the aggregate unit are updated If Disaggregate, the aggregate unit sends updates and entities and/or (sub)units of the aggregate unit are updated If Pseudo-Disaggregate, the aggregate unit sends updates and all Entities and/or (sub)units of the aggregate unit are updated but these “are not capable of full interaction with other entities” If Partially Disaggregate, the aggregate unit send updates and some entities and/or (sub)units of the aggregate unit are updated, but others are not (and are accounted for using the “silent” attribute)

parameter.name: UuidList
parameter.semantics:
Optional for: Disaggregated and FullyDisaggregated Required for: PartllyDisaggregated (and PseudoDisaggregated)
The list of UUIDs which will be instantiated as a result of the disaggregation.

interactionClass.name: MRM_DisaggregationResponse
interactionClass.semantics: A response from the receiving federate indicating ability to comply with request.

parameter.name: Acknowledge
parameter.semantics: The receiver federates response to the disaggregation request.

parameter.name: NonComplianceReason
parameter.semantics: An optional parameter sent only if the ResponseFlagEnum16 value equals 2, UnableToComply, to specify the reason for non-compliance.

interactionClass.name: MRM_AggregationRequest
interactionClass.semantics: A request to aggregate a set of UUIDs

parameter.name: AggregateUuid
parameter.semantics: The UUID of the Aggregate object which will result from the aggregation.

parameter.name: UuidList
parameter.semantics: Optional. The list of UUIDs which should be aggregated.

interactionClass.name: MRM_AggregationResponse
interactionClass.semantics: A response from the receiving federate indicating ability to comply with request.

parameter.name: Acknowledge
parameter.semantics: The receiver federate's response to the request for aggregation.

parameter.name: NonComplianceReason
parameter.semantics: An optional parameter sent only if the ResponseFlagEnum16 value equals 2, UnableToComply, to specify the reason for non-compliance.

interactionClass.name: MRM_CancelRequest
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to cancel either a MRM_DisaggregationRequest or a MRM_AggregationRequest

parameter.name: Reason
parameter.semantics: Reason given for cancelling the request

interactionClass.name: MRM_ActionComplete
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent at the completion of either a DisaggregationRequest or AggregationRequest.

parameter.name: CompletionResult
parameter.semantics: True if the MRM_Action is successfully completed, else false

interactionClass.name: MRM_Trigger
interactionClass.semantics: A trigger to inform the MRM SP to disaggregate or to aggregate an object instance specified by a UUID.

parameter.name: Instance
parameter.semantics: Required. This is the UUID of the object instance intended for disaggregation when triggering a DisaggregationRequest and it is the AggregateUuid when triggering an AggregationRequest

parameter.name: AggregationState
parameter.semantics: Informs Aggregate Federate of intended Aggregation State: If Aggregate, the aggregate unit send updates If Fully Disaggregate, the aggregate unit does not send updates and all Entities and/or (sub)units of the aggregate unit send updates If Disaggregate, the aggregate unit sends updates and entities and/or (sub)units of the aggregate unit send updates If Pseudo-Disaggregate, the aggregate unit sends updates and all Entities and/or (sub)units of the aggregate unit send updates but these “are not capable of full interaction with other entities” If Partially Disaggregate, the aggregate unit send updates and some entities and/or (sub)units of the aggregate unit send updates, but others do not (and are accounted for using the “silent” attribute)

parameter.name: UuidList
parameter.semantics:
Optional when in triggering an AggregationRequest or DisaggregationRequest, state: Disaggregate and Fully Disaggregate
Required when in triggering an DisaggregationRequest, state: Partially Disaggregate and Pseudo Disaggregate.

interactionClass.name: MRM_TriggerResponse
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent in response to MRM_Trigger in order to inform the initiator of the MRM_Trigger interaction 1. that the MRM SP has received the interaction and will act on it and 2. of the TransactionID which will be used for the subsequent interactions associated with the particular trigger (to include the MRM_ActionComplete interaction).

parameter.name: Instance
parameter.semantics: Required. This is the UUID of the object instance specified in the MRM_Trigger interaction.

parameter.name: TransactionID
parameter.semantics: Required. The TransactionID which will be used for all interactions (to include the MRM_ActionComplete interaction) associated with the particular MRM_Trigger interaction.

enumeratedData.name: NonComplianceReasonEnum
enumeratedData.semantics: An enumerated list of reasons why a federate may not be able to comply with a MRM_DisaggregationRequest interaction.
